
### for loops

```{r}
df = data_frame(
  a = rnorm(20, 3, 1),
  b = rnorm(20, 0, 5),
  c = rnorm(20, 10, .2),
  d = rnorm(20, -3, 1)
)

is.list(df)
df[[2]]
```

```{r}
mean_and_sd = function(x) {
  
  if (!is.numeric(x)) {
    stop("Argument x should be numeric")
  } else if (length(x) == 1) {
    stop("Cannot be computed for length 1 vectors")
  }
  
  mean_x = mean(x)
  sd_x = sd(x)

  tibble(
    mean = mean_x, 
    sd = sd_x
  )
}
```
